thread.title: BridgePath Scientific Awarded CIO-CS Subcontract
thread.title_full: BridgePath Scientific Awarded CIO-CS Subcontract - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: BridgePath Scientific Awarded CIO-CS Subcontract
text:
BridgePath Scientific is a subcontractor to En-Net Services, LLC (En-Net). En-Net has been selected as one of the contract holders under the Chief Information Office -Commodities and Solutions (CIO-CS) contract by the National Institutes of Health Information Technology Acquisition and Assessment Center (NITAAC).
Frederick, MD
CIO-CS, a multiple-award Government-Wide Acquisition Contract (GWAC), is a 10 year Indefinite Delivery/Indefinite Quantity (IDIQ) contract with a maximum value of $20 billion over one 60-month base period from May 1, 2015 to April 30, 2020; and one 60-month option period from May 1, 2020 to April 30, 2025. As a CIO-CS subcontractor, BridgePath Scientific will be able to provide biotechnology solutions to Civilian, DOD and other federal government agencies including those in need of patient care and critical health care systems and solutions.
"We are pleased to partner with a top-notch prime like En-Net. BridgePath Scientific is proud to bring nearly a decade of scientific products and services to this GWAC," stated Patrick Haley, President and CEO of BridgePath Scientific.
About BridgePath Scientific
BridgePath Scientific is a Veteran Owned Small Business (VOSB) dedicated to providing scientific/medical/laboratory products and services to governmental agencies, academic organizations, and commercial companies. BridgePath Scientific offers solutions that support a wide variety of medical and scientific initiatives world-wide. By leveraging well-established relationships with major vendors, suppliers and manufacturers, BridgePath Scientific’s approach brings years of experience to bear on complicated issues. The experienced staff bridges the gap between research and enforced criteria.
About En-Net
En-Net is a full service Information Technology solutions provider of hardware, software, networking equipment, cabling, infrastructure, supplies and maintenance services to public sector entities. En-Net’s partnerships with industry leading manufacturers enable us to create turnkey solutions, have access to in depth resources and provide the technical capabilities required to deliver results that meet the exact specifications and IT budget for each customer.
About CIO-CS Contract Prime Contractor: En-Net Services, LLC Contract Number: HHSN316201500054W Contract Type: IDIQ, FFP Multiple Award Contract Base Performance Period: May 1, 2015 - April 30, 2020
